title: Building the EVE Frontier
description:
This is a project demo as part of the MUD Day CLS: autonomous worlds, onchain games, and non-financial applications.
A decentralized sci-fi game built on the MUD framework. Weâ€™ll walk you through launching a smart assembly, writing custom logic using our Builder tool, and configuring it in-game. Witness how on-chain mechanics empower players to create and control autonomous game elements in real-time.
